title: Immifada: the body count begins
author: VD
content_html:
In addition to doing the jobs Americans won’t do, immigrants are committing the crimes Americans won’t commit. This woman’s blood is on the hands of the Obama administration and the advocates of immigration:

An illegal immigrant who was released by U.S. authorities with a Notice to Appear has been arrested for the alleged murder of a woman and kidnapping of children on U.S. soil. The alleged crimes occurred after the man was released.

The man, Pedro Alberto Monterroso-Navas, entered the U.S. illegally with children and turned himself in to U.S. Border Patrol agents. He was processed and released, as are all illegal immigrants who come as unaccompanied minors or incomplete family units from Central America. The alien is from Honduras.

The arrest was first reported by the Associated Press (AP), but Breitbart Texas has exclusively confirmed that the man was part of the Obama Administration’s catch and release policy for family groups from Central America.

It cannot be denied that if the man had simply been repatriated immediately, he would not have been able to kill anyone in Louisiana. Anti-immigrationists need to talk up the danger of immigrants; playing upon real fear for the safety of America’s citizens and childrens is one effective way to supersede the appeal to Ellis Island.

In addition to doing the jobs Americans won’t do, immigrants are
committing the crimes Americans won’t commit
. This woman’s blood is on the hands of the Obama administration and the advocates of immigration:
An illegal immigrant who was released by U.S. authorities with a Notice to Appear has been arrested for the alleged murder of a woman and kidnapping of children on U.S. soil. The alleged crimes occurred after the man was released.
The man, Pedro Alberto Monterroso-Navas, entered the U.S. illegally with children and turned himself in to U.S. Border Patrol agents. He was processed and released, as are all illegal immigrants who come as unaccompanied minors or incomplete family units from Central America. The alien is from Honduras.
The arrest was first reported by the Associated Press (AP), but Breitbart Texas has exclusively confirmed that the man was part of the Obama Administration’s catch and release policy for family groups from Central America.
It cannot be denied that if the man had simply been repatriated immediately, he would not have been able to kill anyone in Louisiana. Anti-immigrationists need to talk up the danger of immigrants; playing upon real fear for the safety of America’s citizens and childrens is one effective way to supersede the appeal to Ellis Island.
